title: What font is this?
content:
Hi, I’m trying to find out what font is this one. Any help?  
Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144340im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_text_4567.jpg)
author: hsu81

comments.content: It looks like a variation on [ITC Rennie Mackintosh](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144340/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/rennie-mackintosh/light/)...
It appears to be [Letraset’s Premier Lightline](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144340/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/premier/lightline/characters.html) with some modifications.

Yep, Premier Lightline (Linotype).  
Maybe some minor derivations.
